ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Barret}
Yo
You really gonna take these
stairs all the way up?

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Tifa}
Well we've got to
get to {Aeris}
to help her somehow.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Barret}
Of all the out of the way

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Tifa}
I don't have time to argue with you!
I'm going!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Barret}
Y, yo {Tifa}!
Don't go alone!
